languages.text: {n}Тонкие стенки ящика раскалываются от ваших ударов, и на брусчатку падает тело заляпанного чернилами старика. Оба высокородных нервно оглядываются, но убегать не рискуют.{/n}

{n}The box's thin walls splinter under your blows, and the ink-stained body of an old man falls to the paving stones. The two noblemen look away nervously, but they do not risk fleeing your wrath.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тонкие стенки ящика раскалываются от ваших ударов, и на брусчатку падает тело заляпанного чернилами старика. Оба высокородных нервно оглядываются, но убегать не рискуют.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The thin walls of the box splinter from your blows, and the ink-stained body of an old man falls to the paving stones. The two noblemen look away nervously, but do not risk fleeing your wrath.{/n}

{n}The box's thin walls splinter under your blows, and the ink-stained body of an old man falls to the paving stones. The two noblemen look away nervously, but they do not risk fleeing your wrath.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你猛砸几下，箱子的薄壁很快变成了碎片。一个浑身沾满墨水的老人从箱子里滚了出来，倒在了石头路面上。两位贵族紧张地移开了视线，但不敢试图逃避你的怒火。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The box's thin walls splinter under your blows, and the ink-stained body of an old man falls to the paving stones. The two noblemen look away nervously, but they do not risk fleeing your wrath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你猛砸几下，箱子的薄壁很快变成了碎片。一个浑身沾满墨水的老人从箱子里滚了出来，倒在了石头路面上。两位贵族紧张地移开了视线，但不敢试图逃避你的怒火。{/n}

languages.text: {n}打撃を加えると箱の薄い板は砕け散り、インクに染まった老人の身体が石畳の上に崩れ落ちた。二人の貴族は不安げに目をそらしたが、あなたの怒りから逃れようとはしなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The box's thin walls splinter under your blows, and the ink-stained body of an old man falls to the paving stones. The two noblemen look away nervously, but they do not risk fleeing your wrath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}打撃を加えると箱の薄い板は砕け散り、インクに染まった老人の身体が石畳の上に崩れ落ちた。二人の貴族は不安げに目をそらしたが、あなたの怒りから逃れようとはしなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus golpes hacen pedazos las finas planchas de la caja, y el cuerpo de un anciano manchado de tinta cae al suelo empedrado. Los dos nobles desvían la mirada con expresión nerviosa, pero no se arriesgan a huir de tu cólera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The box's thin walls splinter under your blows, and the ink-stained body of an old man falls to the paving stones. The two noblemen look away nervously, but they do not risk fleeing your wrath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus golpes hacen pedazos las finas planchas de la caja, y el cuerpo de un anciano manchado de tinta cae al suelo empedrado. Los dos nobles desvían la mirada con expresión nerviosa, pero no se arriesgan a huir de tu cólera.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kutunun ince duvarları, darbelerin altında kıymıklarına ayrılıyor. Sonrasında mürekkebe bulanmış bir ihtiyarın bedeni, kaldırım taşlarına düşüyor. Soylular gergince başlarını çevirse de gazabından kaçma riskine girmiyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The box's thin walls splinter under your blows, and the ink-stained body of an old man falls to the paving stones. The two noblemen look away nervously, but they do not risk fleeing your wrath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kutunun ince duvarları, darbelerin altında kıymıklarına ayrılıyor. Sonrasında mürekkebe bulanmış bir ihtiyarın bedeni, kaldırım taşlarına düşüyor. Soylular gergince başlarını çevirse de gazabından kaçma riskine girmiyorlar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les fines parois de la caisse volent en éclats sous vos coups et le corps tâché d'encre d'un vieil homme s'effondre sur les pavés. Les deux nobles détournent nerveusement le regard, mais ne prennent pas le risque de chercher à fuir votre courroux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The box's thin walls splinter under your blows, and the ink-stained body of an old man falls to the paving stones. The two noblemen look away nervously, but they do not risk fleeing your wrath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les fines parois de la caisse volent en éclats sous vos coups et le corps tâché d'encre d'un vieil homme s'effondre sur les pavés. Les deux nobles détournent nerveusement le regard, mais ne prennent pas le risque de chercher à fuir votre courroux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die dünnen Wände der Kiste zersplittern unter deinen Schlägen und ein mit Tinte beschmierter alter Mann fällt auf den gepflasterten Boden. Die beiden Adeligen wenden nervös den Blick ab, wagen es aber nicht, vor deinem Zorn zu fliehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The box's thin walls splinter under your blows, and the ink-stained body of an old man falls to the paving stones. The two noblemen look away nervously, but they do not risk fleeing your wrath.{/n}
